name: Tile Run (pastaOS)
description:
Hello! Thanks for playing Tile Run. Tile Run is a game where you are a box and you have to try to avoid the color red and try to touch the color green. If you win, you get 3 more lives. If you lose, you lose 3 lives in the Live Multiplier, which controls how many lives you gain when winning. Pressing Space gives you a console of which you type commands. Typing gives you all the commands. To enter each command, press Space. The boss can obliterate you and is gamer-raging! The purple borders prevent one from cheating, & they pop your character. Hint: You need to use the console in order to win Level 3 (the boss level). Try to win!

This was made in the Scratch 3 Offline Editor. Scratch 3 is way less advanced than the C# used in Unity, but can still make games (just simple ones).
